EmailTemplate.subject: RH Contract Membership Reviewed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear «LEAD_NAME»,
Thank you for your interest in a membership with RH Contract. Based on the information provided, your company does not meet the qualifying requirements. The RH Contract team works specifically with businesses that focus on projects in the hospitality, commercial and residential development sectors, based on scope, size, and ongoing nature of projects.
We encourage you to apply for the RH Members Program, where you will receive 25% off everything RH, everyday. This membership includes complimentary interior design services and concierge service to manage your orders.
For questions about the processing of your application, please contact the RH Contract Team at 855.513.3380, or email ContractProjects@rh.com.
Kind Regards,
RH Contract ContractProjects@rh.com
